derske.notes: dertu2, dertu3 and saske2 subsumed. Soil science studies the soil that occupies the pedosphere, one of Earth's spheres. This is not the same as geology (the lujvo for this should mean planetary+composition+science). The two main branches of soil science are pedology (={terderske}; the study of soil in its natural setting) and edaphology (the study of soil in relation to soil-dependent uses). See also {tedske}, {rokske} and {kunske}.

If you are actually translating something with a copyright notice, you should leave the notice in the original language.

cf. {nalgundei}, {jeftu}, {dikni}, {gunka}, {djedi}, {di'i}, {na'e};

"Weekend" (the last two days in a week, presumed to be a rest from work) is a culture-specific concept. It was felt more appropriate to make a word meaning "work holiday" and leave the days/week[s] to be specified by the person.

However, this is technically incorrect since the instrument is not French in origin, but German. Therefore, the International Horn Society has recommended since 1971 that the instrument be simply called the horn." (wikipedia). Also natural horn (=sampu jirnytabra), vienna horn (=vin zei jirnytabra or {tabrviena}), mellophone (={tabrmelofono}), wagner tuba ({tabrvagnri}). See also {jirna} and {tabra}.

jvajvo.notes: A Lojban-specific term. The approach of jvajvo is intended to at least constrain what the x2, x3, x4... etc. of a lujvo may be, and also to draw the semantic values of those places from the semantic values of the places of the component brivla. The rationale is that the place structure of an unknown {lujvo} should not require memorization. This was previously known as ``{dikyjvo}''; a mistranslation of ``regular lujvo'', as it used the wrong sense of ``regular'' (see {dikni}).

nuncti.definition: n1 is an event at which c1 eat(s) c2.

nunda'a.definition: n1 is a fight/battle in which d1 fights d2 over issue d3 (abstract).

nundamba.definition: n1 is a fight/battle in which d1 fights d2 over issue d3 (abstract).

nundansu.definition: n1 is a dance with dancer(s) d1 (individual, mass) to music/rhythm d2.

nunde'a.definition: n1 is a pause by d1 for/until d2 at state d3 before starting/continuing d4 (activity/process).

nundenpa.definition: n1 is a pause by d1 for/until d2 at state d3 before starting/continuing d4 (activity/process).

nundunkrali.definition: n1 is the equality of rights k1=d3 entitled to k2=d1=d2.

nunfirsku.definition: n1 is a facial expression (countenance) of agent f2=c1 expressing f1=c2.

nunflapai.definition: n1 is a trial of dispute j2 involving people f3.
nunflapai.notes: Cf. {nu}, {pajni}, {tavla}, {fapro}, {nunpai}, {flapaizda}. x3 includes not only the disputing parties but also the judge and juries, which may be connected with "jo'u".

nunfusra.definition: n1 is the decay/fermentation (recycling of matter/energy/electrons) of f1 by chemical agent f2.

nunjacycrepu.definition: n1 is fishery (fish industry) of product c2 (aquatic animals) from source/area c3=t1 (ocean/sea/coast/lake/river) by fishermen c1.
nunjacycrepu.notes: x2 can be any harvestable aquatic animals, including mollusks and crustaceans. Cf. {crepu}.

nunji'e.definition: n1 is the life of j1.

nunjmaji.definition: x1 is a gathering/meeting/assembly/conclave/conference/ congregation/congress/convention/encounter/get-together/reunion of participants x2 at location x3 from locations x4.
nunjmaji.notes: Cf. {nu}, {jmaji}, {jdijmaji}, {nunpe'i} for a meeting between two parties.

nunjo'e.definition: n1 is an established connection between j1 and j2 at common locus j3.
nunjo'e.notes: n1 or j1 may be a mass formed with "joi", as is the case in a computer network between a server and clients. Cf. {jorne}, {srana}.

nunka'oku'i.definition: n1 is a condition of ku1 managing the health of ka1.
nunka'oku'i.notes: Usually the prevention, treatment, and management of illness and the preservation of mental and physical well-being through the services offered by the medical, nursing, and allied health professions. x2 and x3 may the same or different. Cf. {kamnu'a}.

nunkei.definition: n1 is a game played by k1 playing with plaything/toy k2

nunlerci.definition: n1 is the lateness of l1 (event) by standard l2.

nunmi'a.definition: n1 is the laugh/laughter of/by c1

nunmikce.definition: n1 is medical, involving doctor/nurse m1, patient m2, ailment m3, and treatment/cure m4.

nunmro.definition: n1 is the death (state of being dead) of m1 (person).

nunmu'i.definition: n1 is the event of m1 motivating action m2 per volition m3.

nunpai.definition: n1 is a trial/judgement/arbitration with judge/arbitrator/referee p1 determining/deciding matter p2.

nunpe'i.definition: x1 is a meeting between x2 and x3 at/in location x4.

nunseltickri.definition: x1 is a believe-deceived with deceive-belief subject x2 with deception subject x3.

nunsezyfanta.definition: n1 is self-restraint shown by f1=s2

nunsimbi'o.definition: n1 is an event of integration between s1=b1

nunskezu'e.definition: n1 is engineering in branch s2 based on methodology s3

nunspe.definition: n1 is the marriage of s1 and s2 according to tradition s3.

nuntoi.definition: n1 is the effort of t1 trying/attempting to do/attain t2 (event/state/property) by actions/method t3

nuntumcrepu.definition: n1 is agriculture of product c2 from source/area c3=t1 by farmers c1

nuntumdesku.definition: n1 is an earthquake at location t2.

nunxumsne.definition: s1 is a trip/drug-induced hallucination about s2 due to chemical substance xu2 with purity xu3.

nunzi'e.definition: n1 is the freedom of z1 doing z2 under condition z3.

nurbe'i.definition: b1 archives s1=b2 in medium b5.

nurfu'i.definition: f1 is a backup / danger avoiding duplicate / copy of f2=s1 in form / medium f3 made by method f4 to protect / secure against event s2 (generally destruction or loss).

nurxru.definition: x1 saves/rescues/redeems/delivers x2=s1 from threat/peril s2

nuznoi.definition: no1 is a news/press release with news nu1 about subject nu2=no2 issued by no3 for audience no4.

pa'oxra.definition: pi1 is a cross section/tomogram, a picture of slice pa1=pi2 of pa2 made by pi3 in medium pi4.
pa'oxra.notes: {samterpli} pa'oxra = CAT scan. There is another kind of tomogram which may be better termed {tadmijyxra}.

pacruxtutra.definition: t1 is the Hell of evil spirit(s) t2=pa1=pr1, evil by standard pa2.

pacyselzu'e.definition: x1=z2=p1 is a sin/evil action by x2=z1 for purpose/goal z3, evil/depraved/wicked (morally bad) by standerd x4=p2.

pacyxlu.definition: xl1 (agent) tempts xl2 into evil xl3=p1 by influence/threat/lure xl4, said act being evil by standard p2.

pacyzu'e.definition: z1 sins by doing z2=p1 by standard p2.

pagyca'o.definition: p1=c1 is a tab (navigational widget) in p2=c2.
pagyca'o.notes: x2 is usually a web browser or a text editor. Cf. {pagbu}, {canko}.

pagygu'e.definition: p1=g1 is a constituent country of p2 (sovereign state / supranational body).

paijdi.definition: j1=p1 gives a verdict j2 (du'u) about matter j3=p2 (abstract).

pairkamni.definition: p1=k1 is a jury/judging panel deciding matter p2 in court/judging body k3.

pairkamnycmi.definition: c1 is a member of jury/judging panel c2=p1=k1 deciding matter p2 in court/judging body k3.

pairseljdi.definition: j2 is a verdict given by j1=p1 about matter j3=p2 (abstract).

pairtruci'e.definition: c1=t1=p1 is the judicial branch of the government of people/territory/domain/subjects t2.

palbi'o.definition: x1 gets promoted to x2 (object, state).

palgau.definition: x1 promotes x2 to x3 (object, state).

paltylu'i.definition: l1 (agent) washes dishes l2 of soil/contaminant l3 with cleaning material(s) l4

pamjai.definition: j1 hugs/embraces j2 with j3 (part of j1) at locus j4 (part of j2).

pamli'u.definition: p1&p2=l1 (mass) date via route l2 using means l3.

pampe'o.definition: pr1=pe1 is a lover of pr2=pe2.

panjelca.definition: j1=p2 is incense emitting odor p1.

panjelga'a.definition: g1=p2 is an incense stick with odor x2=p1.

panjyda'u.definition: x1 is a sponge of species x2.

panjyzme.definition: x1 is a loofa of variety x2.

papsimbi'o.definition: x1 make up/peace with each other under condition x2.

parkla.definition: k1=c1 creeps/crawls to k2 from k3 via k4 using k5=c4.

pasyskaci.definition: s1=p1 is a dress/gown (full-length un-legged garment) of material s2=p2.

patsku.definition: c1=p1 protests expressing c2 to audience c3=p3 via medium c4 about p2.

patspu.definition: s1=p1 protests/objects to/complains about s2=p2 with action s3=p4 to audience p3.

patxi'o.definition: x1=p1 is Protestant in aspect x2.

patyva'u.definition: v1=p1 sighs in exasperation responding to p2 (event/state).

paurseldejni.definition: p1 is a bond issued by d1 held by d3.

pavbudjo.definition: b1 is the first Buddha, Siddhartha Gautama.

pavdei.definition: x1 is a Monday of week x2 on calendar x3.

pavdilcu.definition: x1 is the reciprocal/multiplicative inverse of x2 .

pavdutcinse.definition: c1 is strictly heterosexual in situation c2 by standard c4.
pavdutcinse.notes: This word does not apply to bisexuals and is the direct Lojban equivalent of English "heterosexual". Cf. {pavycinse}, {dutcinse}, {pavmitcinse}.

pavgaryre'e.definition: t1 is a vehicle of units x2 for monorail x3, propelled by x4.

pavmasti.definition: x1 is January/the first month of year x2 in calendar x3.

pavmitcinse.definition: c1 is strictly homosexual in situation c2 by standard c4.
pavmitcinse.notes: This word does not apply to bisexuals and is the direct Lojban equivalent of English "homosexual". Cf. {pavycinse}, {mitcinse}, {pavdutcinse}.

pavmoija'a.definition: j1 has the rank of Lieutenant/1st Lieutenant (equivalent of NATO OF-1) in military unit /organization j2.
pavmoija'a.notes: Cf. {pa}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {relmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

pavnonmasti.definition: x1 is October/the tenth month of year x2 in calendar x3.

pavnonmoija'a.definition: j1 has the rank of Field Marshall/General of the Army//Fleet Admiral/Marshall of the Air Force (equivalent of NATO OF-10) in military unit j2.
pavnonmoija'a.notes: Cf. {pa}, {no}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {sozmoija'a}, {bivmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

pavrelmasti.definition: x1 is December/the twelfth month of year x2 in calendar x3.

pavroi.definition: x1 happens once in interval x2.

pavycinse.definition: c1 is monosexual in situation c2 by standard c4.
pavycinse.notes: Monosexual means sexual interest in only one sex/gender, so this word does not apply to bisexuals (= {relcinse}). Cf. {fetcinse}, {nakcinse}, {mitcinse}, {dutcinse}.

pavypavmasti.definition: x1 is November/the eleventh month of year x2 in calendar x3.

pavyplini.definition: p1 is the closest planet (default is Mercury if p2 is the Sun) revolving around p2 (default is the Sun), with planetary characteristics p3, orbital parameters p4.

pavysei.definition: p1=s1 is alone, lacking the company of s2.

pavyselcei.definition: c2 believes in one god/deity c1 with dominion over c3; c2 is a monotheist.

pavyselji'o.definition: j2 is a monopole with end j1.

pavyseljirna.notes: Refers specifically to animals of the unicorn species, not the result of removing a horn from a two-horned animal.

pavysmu.definition: s1 is the single, unambiguous meaning of s2 recognized/accepted by s3; x2=s2 is unambiguous/explicit according to x3=s3.

paxlai.definition: k1 is k2 (quantifier, default: one) potfuls in quantity.

pazvaufli.definition: x1 miscarries after being pregnant with x2

pedysi'u.definition: x1 are friends (of each other, distributively)
pedysi'u.notes: This is the {jvajvo} version of {simpe'o}. cf {pendo} and {simxu}

peifli.definition: x1=f1=p1 is baffled/befuddled/perplexed/flummoxed by subject x2=p2; x1=f1=p1 is stuck on problem x2=p2.

peisku.notes: Verbal or near-verbal expression of a thought; internal monologue. Made from {pensi} + {cusku}.

peixru.definition: x1=p1 thinks back to origin/earlier state x3 about p2 (abstraction).

pejgau.definition: g1 (agent) spreads p1 over/into p2 from p3.

pelnimre.definition: x1 is a lemon of variety x2.

pelsmela.definition: x1 is an apricot [fruit] of species/variety x2

pempau.definition: pa1 is a verse of poem pe1 about subject pe2 by author pe3 for intended audience pe4.

pengau.definition: g1 introduces p1 to p2 at/in location p3.

pengri.definition: g1 is a group meeting showing common property g2 at/in location p3.

pesru'e.definition: pr1 is cognition (process of thought) with inputs pr2=pe2, outputs pr3=pe3, passing through stages pr4.

pesti'i.definition: s1=p1 hypothesizes s2=p2 to audience s3 about subject/concept x4=p2.

pexfebdja.definition: x1=p1=c1 is a noodle/pasta/boiled dough eaten by x2=c2 made out of x3=p2 (normally grain(s) or legume(s)) which is boiled in x4=f1 (normally water) at temperature x5=f2 and pressure x6=f3
pexfebdja.notes: See also {febjukpa}, {grupesxu}. luvjo from {pesxu}, {febvi}, {cidja}. Not very jvajvo, but it works.

pezri'oxu'i.definition: x1 is chlorophyll of type x2; x1 is chlorophyllous with type x2

pezyfaltricu.definition: t1 is a deciduous tree of species t2.

pezyxruba.definition: x1 is a quantity of sorrel of subspecies x2.

piblitki.definition: l1 is vaginal/penile fluid/secretion of p2.

pifcpi.definition: x1 is a hornbill of species x2.

pifygau.definition: g1 takes into custody/imprisons p1 as a prisoner/captive of p2 restrained/held/confined by means/force p3.

pijyske.definition: s1 is philosophy with methodology s2.

piksku.definition: c1=p3 (agent) comments/remarks on/observes c2=p1 about subject x3=p2 to audience x4=c3=p4 via expressive medium x5=c5.

pilvi'u.definition: v1 peels/removes skin/crust from p2=v3 with/leaving result/remnant/remainder v4.

pimdu'i.definition: d1=p2 has the same feathers/plumage as d2, the feathers/plumage being p1.

pincyfi'e.definition: x1 is a candirú of species/variety x2.

pinjycarvi.definition: c1 is bukkake onto c2 from c3=p2.

pinjyjdu.notes: Includes male and female smegma. Cf. {glevi'i}, {pinca}, {karlakse}, {lakse}.

pinjykapyvi'u.notes: Cf. {pinji}, {skapi}, {vimcu}. See also {pinjyskapi}. Also: v1 is a mohel.

pinjyskapi.definition: s1 is the foreskin of p2=s2.

pinpau.definition: x1 is a row/rank of table/chart x2.

pintu'a.definition: p1=t1 is a plain/flatland at location t2

pinynacmei.definition: x1 is a row vector of dimension x2 with coordinates x3, x4, ...

pipcarna.definition: c1=p1 somersaults over c2 in direction c3 to p2 from p3.

pipkla.definition: k1=p1 skips/hops to k2=p2 from k3=p3 via route k4.

pipnrpiano zei konceto.definition: x1 is piano concerto number x2 in key x3 composed by x4 performed by/at x5( event).

pipybanfi.definition: p1=b1 is a frog of species b2.

pipyjalra.definition: x1 is a grasshopper of order/species/breed x2.

pirlarfi'i.definition: f1=p3 paints picture f2=p1 in style/art form l1 representing/showing p2=f4 on medium p4

pitki'otre.definition: m1 is m2 square kilometers on side / facing m3 by standard m4.

pitnanba.definition: n1 is a pizza with topping/ingredients n2.

plajva.definition: j1=p2 is a policy by p1 policy maker regarding j3 subject of policy, j1 is political
plajva.notes: Made out of {platu}, {javni}. Politics as an activity may be "nu plajva" and political science may be "plajva saske"

plekarni.definition: k1 is a journal/periodical/magazine/[newspaper] printed on paper with content k2 published by k3 for audience k4.

plesigja.definition: s1 is a cigarette made of s2 by s3.

plicme.definition: c1 is the user-name/pseudonym/pen-name of c2=p1 for use with/by resource c3=p2 for purpose p3.

plicru.definition: c1 (agent) allows the use of p2 for use x3=p3 under conditions x4=c3.

plicu'a.definition: c1=p1 adopts/selects/chooses/accepts c2=p2 out of alternatives c3 for purpose p3.

plika'e.definition: x1 is able to use x2 for purpose x3 under conditions x4.

plinycma.definition: c1=p1 is an asteroid/planetoid revolving around p2 with characteristics p3 and orbital parameters p4.

plinyxabykoi.definition: k1 is the equator of planet x2=p1 (default Earth) revolving around p2

plinyxadba.definition: x1 is a hemisphere of planet x2 (default Earth) revolving around p2

plisytricu.definition: x1 is an apple tree of tree species x2.

plivei.definition: v1 is a log/record of data v2 (nu/du'u) about v3=p1's use of resource p2 for purpose p3 recorded in medium v4.

plixau.definition: x1=p2 is useful/good for x2=p1 by the standard of being usable for purpose p3.
plixau.notes: x3 is "usable". See alse {selplika'e}. Made from {pilno} + {xamgu}.

plixauvla.definition: v1 is a useful word meaning/causing v2=x1=p2, a meaning which is useful to x2=p1 for purpose p3, in language v3

plonebrespa.definition: x1 is a frill-necked lizard (Chlamydosaurus) of species x2.

plopijne.definition: pi1=po2 is a staple for holding together pi2, made of pi3
plopijne.notes:
cleaned up from auto noralujv migration
Conceivably this might include a paper fastener as well.
See {plopijnytci} for stapler.

po'edji.definition: x1=p1=d1 wants to own/possess/have x2=p2 for purpose x3=d3, wanting to own/possess/have it by right/custom/law x4=p3.
po'edji.notes: d2 is the abstraction of x1 having x2.

ponbau.definition: p1=b1 is the Japanese language used by b2 to express/communicate b3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).

ponjda.definition: l1 is the Shinto religion with beliefs/practices/tenets including l3

popsna.definition: s1 is the sound of p1 breaking/shattering/cracking/splintering into pieces p2.

popygau.definition: g1 causes p1 to break/fracture/shatter/[split/splinter/crack] into pieces p2.

porzu'e.definition: Group of agents p3=z1 sequentially perform/take turns doing z2 in order p2 for purpose z3.

posfai.definition: f1 is capital stock distributed among shareholders p1=f2 issued by company/corporation/firm p2 .

posterfai.definition: f3 is a/are share/shares distributed among f2=p1, issued by company/corporation/firm f1=p2 under law p3.

posxu'a.definition: x1=p1 claims ownership of x2=p2 in condition p3.

posydi'a.definition: d1 is the price of possessing/owning object d2=p2 for potential owner d3=p1 from vendor d4 under law/custom p3
posydi'a.notes: {ponse}+{jdima}. This variant of {jdima} is pedantically semantic distinction between the price of "ownership" of an object rather than the price of the object itself.

posyselfai.definition: f2=p1 is a/are a/the shareholder(s) of company/corporation/firm f1=p2 with shares/portions f3 under law p3.

potybau.definition: p1=b1 is the Portuguese language used by b2 to express/communicate b3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).

pracmu.definition: j1 is capital (factors of production) used to create goods/services j2=c2.

preblo.definition: b1 is a passenger ship for carrying b2, propleed by p3.

precitri.definition: x1 is a biography of x2, written/created/composed by x3.

precme.definition: c1 (quoted word(s)) is a/the (proper) name identifying an individual person [not necessarily human] c2=p1 to/used-by namer/name-user c3 (person).
precme.notes: Personal name usually today comprises a given name bestowed at birth or at a young age plus a surname, but may vary culturally. Naming convention (=cmene cacyjva). See also {cmene} and {prenu}.

predatni.definition: d1 is a profile of person d2=p1 gathered by method d3.

previnji.definition: v1 is a passenger aircraft for carrying v2=p1, propelled by v3.

prezi'ejva.definition: j1 is a human right for z1=p1 to do z2 (event/state).

prigau.definition: g1 (agent) prints p1 onto p2 using p3 (tool/method).

primi'i.definition: m1=p3 is a printer/printing machine for printing p1 on surface p2.

prityxa'e.definition: xa1=z1 is a/the right hand of xa2=z2, which faces/in-frame-of-reference z3.

pronalka'e.definition: k1=f1 is incapable of opposing f2 (person/force/mass) about f3 (abstract) underconditions k3 (event/state).

prujungau.definition: x1 predicts/foretells/anticipates to x2 fact(s) x3 (du'u) about subject x4 by epistemology x5.

prula'i.definition: p1=l1 is preceding p2=l2 in sequence l3.

prulamcte.definition: n1=l1=p1 is the night before p2=l2 at location n3.

prulamdei.definition: d1=p1=l1 is yesterday; d1=p1=l1 is the day preceding p2=l2, day standard d3.

prulamna'a.definition: n1=p1=l1 is yesteryear; n1=p1=l1 is the year preceding p2=l2 by year standard n3.

prupu'i.definition: pun1 prepones/moves forward pun2 to before pur2.

pruslemijyji'e.definition: x1 is a prokaryote of species/defining property x2.
pruslemijyji'e.notes: Protokaryots are a group of organisms that lack a cell nucleus. P. consists of two domains, bacteria and archaea.See also microorganism (one cellular organism;={jurme}) and eukaryote.

pruspe.definition: s1 is the ex-wife/husband of s2 under law/custom/tradition/system/convention s3.

pudykurji.definition: k1 is a gardener attending to garden p1 belonging to p2, growing plants p3.

pulbanfi.definition: b1=p2 is toad of species b2

pumvau.definition: v1 contains powder of material p2.

purlamke'u.definition: x1 is the last time/previous time that x2 happened.

purzga.definition: p1=z1 previews z2 by means z3 under condition z4.

puvma'ubi'o.definition: x1 is adolescence by standard x2

ra'abri.definition: x1 is a relative clause attached to argument x2 with predicate relation x3 among arguments x4.

ra'erprali.definition: p1=r2 are the retained earnings of company/corporation/firm/partnership p2=r1 resulting from business activity p3.

ra'irgau.definition: g1 maintains g2=r1 (event/state) over interval r2.

ra'irsumji.definition: x1 is the integral of x2 with respect to x3 over x4.

rabybau.definition: r1=b1 is the Arabic language used by b2 to express/communicate b3 (si'o/du'u, not quote).

rabykumte.definition: x1 is a dromedary/Arabian camel of breed x2.

radji'i.definition: x1 admits/accepts/acknowledges/allows/concedes/recognizes that x2 is true about x3 on grounds/under compelling evidence x4

radycru.definition: x1=r1=c1 abandons / gives up x2=r2=c2 under condition x3=r3=c3

rafske.definition: x1 is the morphology of language x2 according to methodology x3.

rajnacmei.definition: x1 is a column vector of dimension x2 with coordinates x3, x4, ...

rajroksfe.definition: s1=rs1 is a vertical rock face / rock surface of rock / mountain rs2 on side rs3 with edges rs4, vertical in reference frame/gravity s2.
rajroksfe.notes: Technically necessary ke (or bo) dropped. Cf. {sraji}, {roksfe}, {fenra}, {cmana}, {farlu}.

rajycla.definition: x1 is tall according to standard x2.

rajyclamau.definition: z1=c1=s1 is taller than z2 by amount z4.

rajyclarai.definition: t1=c1=s1 is the tallest among set/range t4.

rajypau.definition: x1 is a column/file of table/chart x2.

rajyserti.definition: se1=sr1 is a ladder / vertical stairway for climbing structure se2 with steps se3, vertical in reference frame sr2.

rakci'a.definition: c1 carves inscription/text c2 on to c3=s2 using c4=s1.

raltca.definition: x1 is a/the capital of x2.
raltca.notes: Cf. {ralju}, {tcadu}. More general than {trutca}. May be the financial (e.g. New York in USA), industrial (e.g. Sao Paulo in Brazil) or religious (e.g. Mecca in Saudi Arabia) capital of its polity but not necessarily the seat of government.

ralxelbo'a.definition: r1 is the frequency of the carrier wave of signal b1.

ranbu'u.definition: b1=r1 is velvet made from material b2.

ranmoldru.definition: d1=m1=r1 is a/the soft palate of m2.

rapcreze'a.definition: z1=c1 (experiencer) increases in skill / expertise at z2=c2 by amount z3 by means of repeating action r1 r2 times.

rapfinti.definition: x1 is a remake/re-invention of x2

rapsku.definition: c1 repeats c2 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience c3 via expressive medium c4, r2 times (default: one).

rapxruxelkla.definition: x1 is a shuttle between x2 and x3, traveling along route x4, carrying passengers x5.

rapyda'i.definition: d1 beats/hits repeatedly d2 using d3 at locus d4, r2 times.

rarbau.definition: b1 is a natural language spoken by community b2 to express b3.
rarbau.notes: As opposed to constructed spoken languages. Cf. {runbau}

rardugri.definition: x1 is the natural logarithm of x2.

rarji'i.definition: x1=j1 thinks/knows by instinct/feels that x2=j2 [opinion] (du'u) is true about subject/issue x3=j3
rarji'i.notes: From {rarna} and {jinvi}. Drawing conclusions without a proper reasoning, using 'gut feelings' or preconscious thoughts.

rarkrali.definition: k1=r1 (NU) is a natural right of k2 (individual/mass) by standard k3.
rarkrali.notes: Rights which are not contingent upon the laws, customs, or beliefs of a particular society or polity, thus necessarily universal; usually contrasted to legal rights ({flakrali}), which are culturally and politically relative. Cf. {krali}.

rarselfra.definition: f2=r1 is an instinctive reaction from f1 to stimulus f3 under condition f4.

sorgugje'a.definition: j1 is an empire govening over g1 provinces with j2=g3 territories.

sorjaknykarce.definition: k1 is a multiple rocket launcher propelled by k3.

sorjontai.definition: t1 is a web-shape, manifested by t2.

sornai.definition: n1 is an international group of peoples n2.

sorpa'a.definition: p1 hopes for p2 (event); p1 hopes that p2 happens.
sorpa'a.notes: p2 is possible and has medium probability. Cf. {pacna}, {sotpa'a}, {sojypa'a}.

sorpa'i.definition: x1=p1 is polyamorous/loves many people (romantic love implied), including, but not limited to, set x2=p2.
sorpa'i.notes: Romantic love, is, I suppose, not absolutely necessary, but seems likely. See also {prami}, {so'i}, {sorcinpa'i}.

sorprekarce.definition: k1 is a bus/coach for carrying passengers p1=k2, propelled by k3.

sorprekarcytcana.definition: t1 is a bus terminal/station/depot in transport system t2 for buses for carrying p1=k2

sorselcei.definition: c2 believes in many gods/deities c1 with dominion over c3; c2 is a polytheist.

sorsipydi'u.definition: d1 is a dormitory (building/place) where people x2 (complete mass) sleep.
sorsipydi'u.notes: x1 is from {dinju} and x2 is invented but related to {sipna}$_1$. x2 should be used for all the people; e.g. "mi se sorsipydi'u" incorrect speaking for yourself.

sostartai.definition: t1 is a constellation of stars

sosyzda.definition: x1 is a hamlet/settlement with inhabitants x2

sotpa'a.definition: p1 wishes for p2 (event); p1 wishes that p2 happened.
sotpa'a.notes: p2 is unlikely. It has low probability. Cf. {pacna}, {sorpa'a}, {sojypa'a}.

sovykruji.definition: k1 is made of/contains a quantity of custard.

sozymasti.definition: x1 is September/the ninth month of year x2 in calendar x3.

spabi'u.definition: b1 is a hedge separating b2 and b3 in b4 made of plants of species s2.

srebadbi'a.definition: bi1=ba2 is allergic to ba3 with symptoms bi2.

srebandu.definition: x1 erroneously defends x2 against x3; x2 is allergic to x3.

sriba'a.notes: This could also be a striped pattern although {srimo'a} might be more suited to that.

srumu'a.definition: m1 is an iris/diaphragm covering m2, made of m3.

stagycti.definition: c1 is a vegetarian that eats vegetables s3.

stanycma.definition: c1=s1 is a/the sprout/shoot of plant/species s2 by standard/norm c3.

suckancu.definition: x1=k1 estimates numerical value x2=k3=s1 about x3=s2

sudgau.definition: g1 dries/dehydrates s1, removing liquid s2

sudmau.definition: z1=s1 is drier than z2 by amount z4 of liquid s2.

sudnabybli.definition: s1=n1 is a crouton of bread b1, made from grains b2.

sudrai.definition: t1=s1 is the driest among set/range t4 of liquid s2.

sudvanjba.definition: j1=v2=s1 is a raisin/sultana/currant processed from a grape of species j2.

sudytu'a.definition: t1=s1 is a desert with land location t2.

sumgadri.definition: x1 is a sumti qualifier labelling sumti x2 with semantics x3.

sumka'i.definition: x1 is a pro-sumti/pronoun representing x2 as argument of predicate/function x3 filling place x4.

surgau.definition: x1=g1 relaxes x2=s1 by doing x3=g2=s2

sutcli.definition: c1=s1 is fast/swift/quick/hastes/rapid at learning c2 (du'u) about subject c3 from source c4 (obj./event) by method c5 (event/process).

sutkla.definition: s1=k1 quickly comes/goes to destination k2 from origin k3 via route k4 using means/vehicle k5.

sutybajycpi.definition: x1 is a roadrunner of species x2.

sutydji.definition: d1 is eager/impatient for d2=s2 to happen.

sutygau.definition: g1 hurries/rushes/speeds s1 to do/be/bring about s2.

sutyta'asre.definition: x1=sr1=t1=su1 makes mistake x2=sr2 under the conditions of speaking quickly to x3=t2 about subject x4=t3 in language x5=t4 by standard x6=sr4

sutyze'a.definition: z1=s1 accelerates/[speeds up] at doing/being/bringing about s2 (event/state) by amount z3.

suzgugje'a.notes: Cf. {su'o}, {gugde}, {jecta}, {balgu'e}. Examples: United Nations (UN), European Union (EU), Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN).

suzyterki'i.notes:
From {su'o} {te} {ckini}. Any number of places may be used.
This word was invented by xorxes and is intended as an alternative to quantified selbri with {bu'a}; it allows the relations to be specified as sumti.

ta'irva'u.definition: v1=t1 yawns, expressing fatigue due to effort/situation t2 (event)

tabjme.definition: x1 is a diamond (gem) from source x2.

tabryjirna.notes: tabryjirna is foremost a horn {jirna} rather than a brass instrument {tabra}, although it is used as a simple musical instrument. Don't to be mistaken for horn (brass instrument;={jirnytabra}). x2 may be species or a specific animal. Swedish horn were usually made from cow or goat. The israelic shoar were usually made from sheep.

tabybi'o.definition: b1=t1 is charred/carbonized under conditions b3.

tabykrili.definition: k1 is crystalline carbon (default diamond) in form/arrangement k3

tadjycpa.definition: c1 adopts c2=t1 (method) for purpose t2.

tamjycausmani.definition: x1 is a colobus of species x2.

tapsni.definition: si1 is a track of st1 treading on surface st2 using limb st3

tarske.definition: s1 is astronomy based on methodology s3.

tatydenxanto.notes: The mastodon's English name (and former genus name) comes from "breast-tooth" due to the unusual shape of its molars. They are not in the same family as elephants or mammoths {xantrmamutu}.

tatyji'o.definition: t1=j1 a nipple/teat (mammary papilla) of t2.

tatyta'u.definition: tax1 is a bra with purpose tax2.

tcabriju.definition: b1 is the city/town hall of city/town t1

tcacpi.definition: c1 is a pigeon of subspecies c2.

tcanylu'a.notes: Unusual in that t1 appears more than once. x4 is also really a set of t1s. See also {tcana}, {pluta}

tcatru.definition: tu1 is the mayor of tu2=tc1.

tcatypalne.definition: p1 is a tea tray made of p3.

tcebra.definition: b1=m1 is huge/enormous/very big in property b2 with criterion b3.

tcecrogau.definition: g1 (person/agent) tortures/inflicts severe pain on x2=c1 at locus x3=c2.

tcekau.definition: x1 (property - ka) is global among x2.

tcepruske.definition: x1 is archeology of/about subject matter x2 based on methodology x3.

tcesnosli.definition: x1 is an oscillate with oscillation state x2.

tcetce.definition: m1 is very much/very extreme in property m2 (ka), towards m3 extreme/direction.
tcetce.notes: Differs from {mutce} only in intensity; add more "tce" to taste. Made from {mutce} + {mutce}.
